name: URigVMParameterNode
doc:
The Parameter Node represents an input or output argument / parameter
of the Function / Graph. Parameter Node have only a single value pin.

methods.name: GetCPPType
methods.doc: Returns the C++ data type of the parameter

methods.name: GetCPPTypeObject
methods.doc: Returns the C++ data type struct of the parameter (or nullptr)

methods.name: GetDefaultValue
methods.doc: Returns the default value of the parameter as a string

methods.name: GetParameterDescription
methods.doc: Returns this parameter node's parameter description

methods.name: GetParameterName
methods.doc: Returns the name of the parameter

methods.name: IsInput
methods.doc: Returns true if this node is an input
